translations: 孵卵处，孵化场（hatchery 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Now are also hatcheries in which fish are farmed.
sentences.translation: 现在也有一些鱼苗孵化场可以人工养殖鱼类。

sentences.sentence: So they set up well-equipped hatcheries and went to work.
sentences.translation: 因此他们建造了装备良好的孵卵场所并开始工作。

sentences.sentence: Many old poultry buildings, hatcheries, and feed mills Can be redesigned.
sentences.translation: 许多老的禽舍，孵化室和饲料磨坊可以重新设计。
